performance.SERVICE_NAME:
select X.rule_seq, X.cnt , Y.context_name
from (select rule_seq, count(*) as cnt
from rule_context_hist
where create_datetime >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day)
group by rule_seq) X , rule_context Y
where X.rule_seq = Y.seq
order by X.cnt desc
limit 0, 1

benefit.SERVICE_NAME:
select strategy_code , benefit
from coin_slope_strategy
where date >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day)
order by benefit desc
limit 0, 1

frequency.SERVICE_NAME:
select X.code, X.cnt
from (select code, count(*) as cnt
from coin_slope_strategy
where date >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day)
group by code) X
order by X.cnt desc
limit 0, 1

sum.SERVICE_NAME:
select strategy_code , sum(benefit) as sum
from coin_slope_strategy
where date >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day)
order by sum(benefit) desc
limit 0, 1
